reviews.comments: Todo excelente, 100% recomendable!

Hermoso dpto y re bien ubicado. A 4/5 calles de la zona de bares y restaurantes. El dpto es hermoso, espacioso y súper lindo decorado. Tmb es muy lindo el ultimo piso con pileta que tiene una vista espectacular. Volvería y lo recomendaría!
Excelente todo

El depto es tal cual las fotos. Muy lindo y bien ubicado!. Incluso usamos la pileta!
Muy recomendable
El dpto es genial cómodo limpio y fácil de ubicación. Gracias x todo
Confort, seguridad, y seriedad de Shane

El departamento es muy confortable, la cama muy comoda y amplia, buena calefacción y agua caliente. La ubicación es segura y tranquila, cercana a una avenida con varias opciones gastronómicas. Shane tiene muy buena disposición  y responsabilidad.

El departamento es tal cual lo describen, además de limpio y funcional. Las instalaciones son fantásticas. La seguridad es excelente (hay guardia en la entrada las 24 horas). El barrio es tranquilo con un pequeño supermercado a la vuelta. Y a 4 cuadras hay una importante avenida que permite salidas y evitar largos regresos. Muy recomendable.
Muy buena ubicación e infraestructura!! Muy lindo departamento.
El departamento está en un barrio muy lindo, Shane es muy amable, no maneja bien el español pero se esfuerza mucho por complacer a los huéspedes. El dpto. está muy bien equipado para 4 personas.

Sin lugar a dudas la mejor manera de disfrutar Mendoza es el Departamento de Shane. Excelente ubicación, amplio y cómodo. Shane respondió a todo y compró una pava eléctrica cuando la anterior se rompió. Maravillosa experiencia.

Shane es el anfitrión perfecto para que la visita a Mendoza sea muy cómoda. Nos encontramos con un apartamento muy cómodo, lindo, limpio y muy bien ubicado. Todo funcionaba a la perfección y no nos hizo falta más nada para el alojamiento. Muy bien equipado. Además de esto Shane te asesora sobre excursiones y zonas a visitar en Mendoza, y es flexible en check in y check out (lo cual es genial). Muchas gracias Shane!

El departamento de Shane es realmente muy bonito y comodo. Desde el punto de vista del equipamiento hay que decir que no le falta nada. Los colchones y almohadas son muy comodos y se encuentran en perfecto estado. El balcon es precioso y como valor agregado tiene  cochera doble. Se encuentra en un edificio con todas lss comodidades. Tiene piscina, sum parrilla y laundry. La zona es muy tranquila y a dos cuadras esta la zona nocturna con restaurantes y pub. Custodia las 24 hs.
X airbnb, todo exelente
El departamento estaba perfectamente ubicado en relación al centro y al parque san martin, muy confortable! nos permitió complementar una estadía espectacular
Impecable Dpto. Con absolutamente todo lo que se necesita. Excelente ubicación. Muy buena predisposición de Shane para que no te falte nada. 100% recomendable!

Nos alojamos con mi marido, mi bebe de 16 meses y mis padres. El departamento es tal cual muestran las fotos! Muy bien equipado, comodo y limpio. Tanto el edificio como el barrio son muy tranquilos. Ademas el edificio tiene seguridad las 24 hs. Y la cochera estuvo incluida. Todo perfecto! Solo la segunda habitacion resulta un poco pequeña para dos adultos, pero la cama es super comoda! Y mis padres estuvieron muy bien de todas formas! Shane fue muy amable desde el dia que llegamos y estuvo atento a cualquier cosa que necesitaramos durante toda nuestra estancia. Lo recomiendo!! Nos sentimos muy comodos y como en casa! Nos gustaria volver!
Excelente departamento con muchas comodidades y ubicación privilegiada. Además de ser todo muy organizado y seguro. Shane es además muy atento, predispuesto y paciente.
Recomendable. Apto limpio y moderno. Un cuarto en suite muy bueno. Un segundo cuarto pequeño pero con cama matrimonial. El segundo baño no tiene ducha.
reviews.response: Thank you so much yes my add says it is a 1 1/2 bath but the second room is a queen bed thanks again

reviews.comments:
El departmento fue excelente para nosotros. Detallando:

1) Tenia lo que necesitábamos. 
2) El anuncio es fiel a lo que encontramos: limpio, moderno. 
3) Shane estuvo atento a todo lo que solicitamos. 
4) La región es calma y el departamento silencioso
5) El edificio es bonito
Recomendamos sin dudas.

La verdad es que de un principio vimos y pasamos muy bien en el departamento, el anfitrión nos estaba esperando para entregarnos las llaves, nos explico todo el funcionamiento y estaba todo en óptimas condiciones. El anuncio en la web fue muy correcto, y esta ubicado en un barrio muy lindo y tranquilo cerca del parque y de restaurantes, hay un super a 3 cuadras.
Con garaje y portero las 24hs. Pasamos muy bien.

My family and I stayed at Shane's apartment for a few days while visiting Mendoza. The apartment is very nice and exactly as shown in the pictures. The swimming pool on the roof is great and the view of the mountains in the distance is very relaxing. The area is quiet, not too far from the center and very close to the San Martin park. Shane was ready there when we arrived. He was always available when we needed anything and always willing to help, I'd recommend his apartment to anyone visiting Mendoza who want a comfortable place to stay.

Shane was incredibly welcoming and hospitable. We were four people and were very comfortable in his apartment. The location was ideal to walk to restaurants, bars and a grocery store. The kitchen is very well stocked and very comfortable to cook meals in. We especially enjoyed the balcony!

Shane’s apartment was fantastic for a stay in downtown Mendoza, close enough to the hustle of the city but still quiet enough to be comfortable. Shane went above and beyond to make sure we felt welcome and taken care of during our stay to the point of planning and driving us to wineries on multiple days. He made himself extremely available to us for anything we may have needed during our trip and it really made it an experience to remember. Thank you, Shane!

Stylish apartment in a good neighbourhood, we could walk to the amazing park and all the restaurants. Great to watch some films in English after lots of travelling !A great stay and Shane very helpful picking us up in Maipu.

We stayed at Shane's place for 10 days. The location was great! Close to the supermarket and specialty stops and just a short walk to Avenida Villa Nueva which had tons of local restaurants and shops. He was very communicative and even picked us up in Santiago and drove us back to Mendoza, stopping along the way to show us some of the local spots and letting us take pictures. I would definitely recommend his place!
Love the location of Shane's place, can walk to the park and many bars and restaurants.  Pickup from Airport was a nice plus too. View from roof is beautiful
Shane’s place was great. Located perfectly and super easy to get places by foot or taxi. The building is super nice and Shane is quite helpful. Would come back!

This modern apartment has all you need, is in a great but quiet location, close to a local supermarket, pastry shop & cafe. The terrace is a relaxed space for an afternoon vino after spending the day exploring the Mendoza region. We did a wine and mountain tour with Shane, maximising our short stay in Mendoza. Both tours were a great experience, off the beaten tourist track and excellent value. Thanks Shane for being such an excellent host. You certainly deserve your Super host status with AirBnb.

We really enjoyed our stay at Shane's place. The location is great. Close to nice restaurants and shops. And not too far away to public transport. Really spacious and clean. Unfortunately, there was a problem with the internet rooter when we arrived and we didn't have wifi for 2 days but it was just a "bad luck" and could happen any time to anyone. Shane reacted very quicly and arranged for the rooter to be repaired in no time (trust me, in Argentina it nornmally could take quite a while). And in the meantime he offered an alternative solution, which helped a lot. The pick up at the airport is a big plus! Thank you Shane!
Nice host, attentive, friendly and a great friend
Transportation to and from airport is a real plus. Ideal location.  Free laundry. Both of his tours were great an very reasonable priced.
Ótimo imóvel, amplo e agradável, além de tudo bem limpo. A localização é muito boa e pode ser feito tudo a pé. A disponibilidade de t Shane também é ótima. Recomendamos

The best airbnb experience we have had to date!  Began with pickup from airport by Shane then took us to the apartment.  Apartment is in great location.  Very safe area - walking at night no problem.  Only 3 blocks easy walk to main restaurant street.  Handy mini-mart just round the corner.  Apartment was very spacious, had everything we needed.  Laundry in apartment block which we found very handy!  We chose to do a tour up the mountains with Shane and it was a great day!  Thank you for your wonderful hospitality Shane we had an awesome stay!  Just wished we had more time in Mendoza to explore more!
Shane's place was perfect for our stay. He location was very close to nearby shops and restaurants, and we felt very safe with the 24 hour front desk concierge. We would definitely stay again!
Ótimo local, moderno, limpo, confortável. Localização privilegiada. Super indico.
Nice, secure building, close to main street of bars/restaurants. The airport pick-up was a nice addition!

The apartment was great - modern with everything you will need it's easy walk to cafes corner shops,great pastry shop and amazing olive selling store. Restaurants only a short walk and neighbourhood safe and quiet- in warm weather rooftop pool would be fantastic as would the verandah in the unit - beds were very comfortable although for 2 couples second room fairly small but main one huge . Laundry on site which was great - we did 2 tours with Shane and very highly recommend them - all in all a fantastic Trip - try La Azul restaurant !
ótima acomodação e o anfitrião ainda nos buscou no terminal rodoviário. Recomendo para dois casais sem crianças.

This is my second time staying at Shane's apartment, and it is a great place to stay in Mendoza! He is a great host and is helpful and accommodating. Good location for seeing the city but also traveling to the bodegas. He is knowledgeable about local places and makes you feel at home.
Gostamos e indicaríamos .
Great host, English speaking, even had a couple great tours with Shane

Shane was a perfect host ensuring we had all we needed in the apartment..The tours he offered were good value of which we accepted the wine tour...The pick up at the airport was punctual and the drive to the apartment was informative on what to see and do,where to dine,shopping centres etc..Very helpful..

Wonderful location on a quiet block of an upscale residential neighborhood with plenty of bars, restaurants, shops and other necessities within a 10-minute walk.  There is a convenience store around the corner and a larger grocery store about 3-4 blocks away.  Although the block/neighborhood is quiet, it is right on a bus route, which means there's loud noise every 10-20 minutes if you're trying to sleep with the windows open (frankly, it didn't bother us, as most of the time we kept windows closed and used the A/C).  The building is fairly new (doorman told us it was built in 2014), looks great and is well maintained.  Neighbors were courteous and friendly. 
 The 24-hour doorman arrangement is great for safety and to have someone who can answer quick/basic questions.  The unit is comfortable and Shane was a very responsive and welcoming host.  There are laundry facilities in the basement, which we used once (note: there's only one washer and one dryer, so you may need to wait to use them).  We also booked and used the events room on the top floor, for a gathering of about 12 people (although the room is big enough for perhaps 50 or more).  It was very convenient, as for a nominal fee you can use their dishware and silverware and not have to worry about cleaning up at the end of your party.  Beware, though, you will need to vacate the room at 1am, which is pretty early by Argentine standards (this may have been due to our event being on a Monday - not sure if the "curfew" is different on weekends).  We did not use the swimming pool, but it looked very nice.  We did use the included garage space, which was super convenient, even if ingress/egress were a bit awkward due to a steep ramp with a tight turn (don't bring a big car!).  We would absolutely stay at this property again on a future trip.  Thank you, Shane!
reviews.response: Hi thank you for you're review sorry about the bus traffic my street is not on the bus route the main road is under construction so they are re routing the busses on my street for two more weeks sorry for the noise

reviews.comments: Wonderful stay at Shane's apartment. Secured entry with a guard, rooftop pool, and equipped kitchen were great ammenities. Highly recommend Shane's tours for wineries- he has seen a lot and knows what is worth it if you have a short stay.

This location was prime and Shane's knowledge, willingness to share his Mendoza and the ease of contacting him was phenomenal. Ending our Patagonia tour in Mendoza, horseback riding through the foothills, eating at great local restaurants, vineyard tours with Shane  and ending our trip with a blending session was probably one of the best decisions we made. HUGE THANKS for helping to make our trip memorable!
Gostamos muito do apartamento de Shane. Boa localização e confortavel. O anfitrião sempre esteve disponível quando necessário.

Shane was a great host and the apartment is in a great location in Mendoza and in a secure building.  The apartment is walk able to a great park, plenty of restaurants, a supermarket, and many more stores.  Shane checked in on us, helped with recommendations, pick up / drop off at airport was super helpful, and provided us with tours to the wineries.  I highly recommend using Shane as a tour guide to the wineries as it is very tricky driving out to the various valleys and finding the wineries- Shane makes your trip stress free.

Had a great stay at Shane's place for the weekend! Shane was kind enough to pick us up from the airport and was available 24/7 for anything we needed. The apartment was modern, clean, and as pictured. The outdoor space on the patio was a great feature, and we loved the rooftop pool. We even cooked asado on the rooftop patio, where they have a kitchen and grill available for use. The apartment was well located and taxis were very quick and efficient in taking us to wineries (we had booked previously or else would have taken Shane up on his offer for a private tour). We had a great stay and would definitely stay again! Thanks Shane!

Shane was the perfect host!
From the start the free pick up from the overnight bus was wonderful.
The flat was as described and the rooftop pool was a real bonus and greatly appreciated.
We had limited time in Mendoza and Shane helped us make the very best of it by guiding us into the mountains and out to the wineries. Seeing Aconcagua was amazing and the winery meal was just superb.
Shane's local knowledge was invaluable and the day trips were good value and with his personal touch much more enjoyable and cheaper then if we'd used a tourist agency.
I'd definitely recommend this Airbnb for a really good stay.

Our stay at Shane's apartment was amazing. The apartment is exactly as advertised, and less than a 10 minute walk to the cities major "bar street". Shane went above and beyond, picking us up at the aiport, and booking our trip to the hot springs for us. In addition he took us on a wine tour of the Uco Valley, and a scenic tour of the mountain for a very reasonable price. Thanks again for everything Shane!

Shane was extremely prompt with all communication. Guests benefit from his vast knowledge of wineries and restaurants in Mendoza, as well as the Lujan de Cuyo and the Uco Valleys. The fact he is a native English speaker made our trip easier as we are not fluent in Spanish. For an extra fee, he took us on two great tours to a variety of wineries and accommodated all of our winery requests. The apartment is in a great location, a 20 minute walk from many bars and restaurants, and well maintained. Shane promptly replied to all inquiries related to the apartment and building. When we return to Mendoza, we will be booking with Shane again.

Great location and space. Rooftop pool was excellent. Safe, clean apartment. Shane was helpful, and was great with communication. Great 2 days of wine tours in the local area and UCO valley. Highly recommend his guided tours as they are efficient and good value. Would recommend to friends and family.

This is a gem and Shane is a terrific host. The place is clean and modern with a full kitchen, even a four burner stove and oven. A/C is very efficient and works very well. Also ceiling fans. Rooms and lounge area and balcony are sizeable and comfortable. TV even has English-speaking channels. But the "hit it out of the park" thing is the rooftop pool. Extraordinary place, wonderful cool water in hot weather. 
Shane's tours to wine country and the Andes ought not to be missed. He has relationships with a number of vineyards and very lovely luncheon sites...don't miss Clos de Chacres, for example, a small and old winery/bodega where we had a four course lunch with various wines, served in an outdoor setting near a pond. He knows the wine country and his driving is quite good, and the vehicle, altho' a truck, is very comfortable. Take the trip to Mount Aconcagua; you will have a unique and exciting experience, with wild llamas and sights of Andes condors. This is the way touring should be done, vs. the big outfits.  Thanks, Shane, for a great time.

Since day one, Shane reached out to discuss our upcoming trip to Mendoza. He was very responsive and always had great suggestions. Upon our arrival to Mendoza, he picked us up from the bus station and made us feel at home immediately. He provided several restaurant recommendations for dinner. During our stay (3 nights), we did 2 full-day tours with Shane. He took us to different wineries (he suggested and made reservations for us) to get the wine tasting experience. Next day, he took us to Uspallata through the mountains, and we got amazing views and even snow. Shane was a great host (as my cousin said during our trip "Shane was the MVP") and would definitely recommend staying with him. If we come back to the Mendoza are, we will definitely stay with again with him.

We had a great time staying in Shane's apartment. He went out of his way to pick us up; the apartment was wonderful and totally spotless. We weren't planning to take the private wine tour he offers but it turned out to be an excellent experience and great value. We loved the rooftop pool! Highly recommended.

We had a fantastic experience staying at Shane's in Mendoza!  The apartment is spacious, very clean and located in walking distance to all the great restaurants and bars in Mendoza. Shane was a superb host - he introduced us to the area and gave us many good recommendations.  He even organized two private wine tasting tours for our group!  I can highly recommend staying at Shane's, you will no doubt have a great time.

Shane has a great apartment that comfortably fit the three of us, and was an excellent host! He gave us recommendations and made great reservations, ensuring we saw the best of Mendoza during our short stay. Highly recommended!

Myself, my partner and 2 friends booked this apartment for a 3 day stay in Mendoza. Shane was absolutely wonderful from the minute we booked. He went out of his way to pick us up at 7am from the bus station and stored our luggage until we could check in. The apartment was so lovely and spacious, perfect for 4 people. All of the amenities were great and everything was impeccably clean. The roof top pool was beautiful for a swim and to soak up the sun. The location is great, only a short walk to supermarket, restaurants, bars and a lovely park. 
We decided to head off with Shane on a full day wine tour. This was so amazing and we would highly recommend. It was great to go at your own pace and have such a personalised venture around the wineries. 

We loved Mendoza so much we decided to stay an extra day, unfortunately Shane's apartment was booked. Shane however then arranged for us to stay in private rooms in another residence he has. This was fantastic too! 

We have rented many places through Air BnB and have not come past a host as hospitable, helpful and friendly as Shane. Don't go past this place!

Shane was a fantastic and friendly host eager to offer great tips and advice when asked about all the great things Mendoza has to offer. The apartment and the location were perfect for those wanting a central, walkable abode near parks, plazas,  bars restaurants, and museums. I strongly recommend Shane as a host. Thank you,  Shane for everything!

Shane could not have been better - he offered to collect us/take us back to the   to  the temporary airport ( at San Juan which is about 2 hours from Mendoza)  despite the fact we had to leave Mendoza at around 5.45am!  He  arranged an absolutely brilliant day of wine tasting including making reservations beforehand. He  immediately dealt with our questions (e.g we couldn't figure out  how to turn on the tv) and additionally   gave two fabulous restaurant suggestions. They both had  great food and atmosphere and Annas restaurant  is a delightful walk along the beautiful parkland nearby.  The costs for the wine tour and transfer to the temporary airport were well worth the money and totally worth the convenience! He made us feel so welcome!!

All i can say, is this apartment without a doubt is one of the best AIRBNB rentals i have ever stayed at. The apartment itself is absolutely faultless!! Myself and my wife stayed here for our honeymoon during our recent trip to mendoza and from start to finish it was a pleasure. The place is huge with a gorgeous balcony, fully equipped kitchen, large living area, amazing rooftop pool all within a secured block with a 24/7 security guard both on the building and on the street. And before you think, these security guards are needed, they are not at all!!! It is in an extremely safe location. We felt safe walking around at any time of the night.
The location is perfect....a few blocks from the main strip where all the best restaurants and bars are, a few blocks from a major supermarket and a few blocks from a beautiful park not to mention a great ice cream parlour just around the corner.
Shane also offers trips up the mountain and just across the boarder in his 4X4. For those in any doubt...... this is an absolute must!!!! Views are spectacular and its a private comfortable trip that takes you to places that buses can't, all at a fraction of the price!!! 
Thank you so so much Shane and Mariana for a fantastic day out.

Shane met us at the San Juan airport and drove us to Mendoza.  He was also a great guide to the Andes and to a couple wineries.  He set up a manicure for me and suggested a great walking tour.  He provided great information about Mendoza city and did everything possible to make our stay enjoyable.  Shane was easy to reach and very helpful.
Shane met us to show us around the apartment and made himself during our stay to the extent we needed.

We had an amazing time staying in Mendoza! Shane was an excellent host - picking us up from the bus station and then providing us with tours of vineyards - when we didn't know where to go! He was great! A particular surprise was when one of us had our ATM card returned to us through Shane and the Mendoza ex-pat community... very impressive. All in all a great time!
Great location and lovely flat - particularly enjoyed the wine tour organised by Shane. Great host in general - I would highly recommend staying here.

I just got back from my weekend at Shane's Mendoza Apartment. From the first moment we saw the apartment it was great, a building near brand new, apartment in perfect shape, as seen on the pictures. Also Shane made himself available for advice and turistic information. 100% recommended.

O apartamento é muito confortável e muito bem localizado! Essas duas características fizeramos com que a nossa estadia (04 pessoas) fosse ainda melhor. Todos os dias fomos e voltamos andando até o centro sem qualquer problema! Além disso, o anfitrião nos mostrou um pouco da cidade e nos ajudou com varias dicas de vinícolas e restaurantes!
Beautiful place close to Mendoza center. Shane was very nice and helpful. Thanks for everything. We would definitely come back!

We are a family of 4 (kids 8 and 10) and we had a great stay at Shane's apt in Mendoza.  It is well located close to lots of cafes, bars and a big supermarket.
The pool on the roof was great and the apt had everything we needed and was an pond good size.
Shane took us into the Andes one day - a fantastic day passing through small villages and playing in the snow. We also went with Shane to 2 bodegas.  We only wanted to do halcyon a day out and Shane was able to accommodate with wineries close to Mendoza. 
All in all a fantastic experience and I'd have no hesitation in recommending the apartment.
Gracias Shane

Shane was great, from easy of booking and communicating with us, to picking us up at the airport and taking us on some wine taking excursions. The apartment was well located, just down the street from one of the main drags, and around the corner from the large public park, perfect for long runs. The accommodations were nice and modern, and wifi worked well. Overall, we enjoyed our stay, and the city of Mendoza.

Shane's apartment was very comfortable, clean, well appointed, and close to everything! Wish the weather was better, so that we could have enjoyed the rooftop pool. We visited Mendoza for three days, prior to our stay in Buenos Aires. We can't say enough about Shane's hospitality. He picked us up from the airport, after a long journey from SF Ca., which was very considerate and welcoming. He also gave us a tour of the area on the way to his apartment, offering points of interest and some great restaurant recommendations. Shane also offers personal tours of the mountains, and Mendoza's bodegas, which we took him up on, our last day there. He took us to some amazing bodegas for tours and tastings, and arranged an unforgettable lunch for us at Siete Fuegos, at the Vines Resort and Spa. We only had a few days to spend in Mendoza, but thanks to Shane we were able to see and experience so much! Thank you again my friend, we will definitely return, next time in the summer!
We had a great time in Mendoza. The apartment was so comfortable and Shane did an awesome job showing us around the area.

Shane was great! He picked us up and helped us exchange money. He gave recommendations and actually will do tours and drive people to the therma spa, wineries or the mountains. The place was a great location just a few blocks from a main street with tons of restaurants and bars. The place was clean with a nice balcony. We had a wonderful experience in Mendoza and I would highly recommend staying here!

Shane was a great host and made us feel at home!
He helped us with whatever we needed.  He also does tours and transfers so it was very convenient and very pleasant to go around Mendoza with him.
Thanks a lot Shane and will see you soon!
Shane's house was great. It was in a nice neighborhood and close to a lot of good restaurants. The shared space in the apartment complex was fantastic. I would definitely recommend staying here.

This is a great place in the center of town and all the action in a clean and secure building with a beautiful park is just a few blocks away.  A very comfortable unit for 3 people and the 1.5 baths is a real plus.  The view from the balcony and the pool of the town and the foothills of the Andes is spectacular. Shane is a fabulous host willing to provide transportation to and from the airport, provide tours of wineries and recommend/book reservations at the best restaurants in Mendoza.  Thanks Shane for helping to make our stay in Mendoza easy and memorable!

Very nice and very clean flat in a great neighborhood, unit is new and sharp.  Happening Street scene just two blocks away, Great price and location, Shane  picked us up at the airport, dropped us off at the unit and gave us a tour. Shane is personable and trustable and even provides transportation to the wine country and the mountains. Could not have had a better overall experience in Mendoza.  Highly recommended.

We loved the place and Shane as a guide. The kitchen is the best equip you can find when traveling, nice pots and pans. The beds are the best, the towels etc- he didn't go cheap on this one. The wifi worked perfectly. Had many good nights on the porch drinking wine, the pool on the roof thrilled the kids. Shane is the best host and guide ever. Eat at sien fuegos- best meal we had in Argentina- recommended by Shane.

This place is great! We stayed there for four nights with two small kids (6 and 3) and it worked out perfectly. The apartment is fully equipped and larger than what we thought. The pool is pretty nice and perfect for kids. The location is also a big plus. Shane was very friendly and quickly responded every time we had questions. I highly recommend this place!

This is a great and spacious apartment in a quiet, safe neighborhood. It is very clean and equipped with everything you might need! The beds were super comfortable and the balcony is an awesome place to hang out on summer evenings! Shane is a great host who is quick to respond to any questions and is very accommodating!

We had the best stay here! Shane was a fantastic host and collected us from the airport. On arrival the flat was very clean, well stocked with the essentials and even a bottle of very good wine. Over the week Shane was a great help in organising and advising us on things to do in Mendoza and on the day we left he took us to the hot springs on our way to the airport. Fantastic host, lovely apartment and one of the best stays of my trip so far. Highly recommended!!!

Shane was extremely attentive and helpful. The apartment has a fantastic view, is well equipped, and the pool was a major plus. Only downside is the elevator has some issues working consistently, this is not a problem if you are relatively mobile as the apartment is only on the second floor but more difficult if you have a pram. We also had the most spectacular view of fireworks, this is a great place for New Years! Pick up and drop off to the airport were a major plus.
Very nice furnished appartment with balcony and pool on the roof. Very central and nice neighboorhood. Thank you for the great time here.

Amazing stay and the apartment is in the best location in Mendoza. Shane was very helpful and welcoming when we arrived and you couldn't get a better spot. 5 mins walk to park and same to main bars and restaurants. Apartment was clean and comfortable with a great terrace for breakfast and BBQs. A fantastic stay and the pool on the roof was an added bonus. Highly recommend.

Awesome condo & great host! The condo is located in close proximity to everything you need in Mendoza, plus it's huge! Great private balcony as well. Shane was a gracious host & helped us get settled in Mendoza & made sure we had everything we needed. Definitely recommend !
